name: Rhythm Loops
description:
A rhythm game where you're the artist - make music by recording 10 second loops, then jam back to your tune! Created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare Jam 51 (Theme: "Every 10 seconds").

Controls
  • Use the A S D L ; ' keys to play notes (didn't get around to controller support unfortunately)
  • Press ESC to end a song early
Notes
  • The embedded html5 version above doesn't allow copying/pasting song data; here's an external link that does
  • The linux version is untested
